price: 12. Waxaan ka abuurnay Aadmiga wax laga soo soocay dhoobo.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
